infocenter_data.iar_description: This example uses the Ethrenet MAC (EMAC) / Gigabit Ethernet MAC (GMAC) and the on-board Ethernet transceiver available on Atmel SAMA5D3-EK, SAMA5D3-XULT, SAMA5D4-EK, SAMA5D4-XULT or SAMA5D2-Xplained. It enables the device to respond to a ping command sent by a host computer.
